snippet: Mr. Shindo, who directed nearly 50 movies, was perhaps best known for films with themes relating to the wartime atomic devastation in his native Japan.
abstract: Kaneto Shindo, venerable Japanese filmmaker whose work was haunted by the wartime devastation of his native Hiroshima, dies at age 100.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Shindo, who directed nearly 50 movies, was perhaps best known for films with themes relating to the wartime atomic devastation in his native Japan.

headline.seo: Kaneto Shindo, Wide-Ranging Filmmaker, Dies at 100
headline.main: Kaneto Shindo, Wide-Ranging Filmmaker, Dies at 100
headline.print_headline: Kaneto Shindo Dies at 100; Wide-Ranging Filmmaker
